snippet: The relief was palpable in all of Australia's players on Monday after they survived a huge scare to defeat Pakistan by 39 runs in the first test, but none would have felt it more than captain Steve Smith....
lead_paragraph: The relief was palpable in all of Australia's players on Monday after they survived a huge scare to defeat Pakistan by 39 runs in the first test, but none would have felt it more than captain Steve Smith.

headline.main: Smith the Most Relieved After Australia's Great Escape
headline.print_headline: Smith the Most Relieved After Australia's Great Escape
